sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 'Cloud01' AS Cloud,branch_Code, grn_date,COUNT(*) NoOfRecords
FROM tmpRawLeapTAS_PURD_cloud1
WHERE branch_Code NOT LIKE 'T%'
GROUP BY branch_Code, grn_date

select 'Cloud02' AS Cloud,branch_Code, grn_date,COUNT(*) NoOfRecords
FROM tmpRawLeapTAS_PURD_cloud2
WHERE branch_Code NOT LIKE 'T%'
GROUP BY branch_Code, grn_date

select 'Cloud03' AS Cloud,branch_Code, grn_date,COUNT(*) NoOfRecords
FROM tmpRawLeapTAS_PURD_cloud3
WHERE branch_Code NOT LIKE 'T%'
GROUP BY branch_Code, grn_date
ORDER BY 2
